CustomObject.description:
Win@proach PI Activity Field Mapping. Enter Long name for default "Name" field and "Activity Short Name". e.g. Name:Cancelled and Activity Short Name: C
USED FOR WIN@PROACH INTEGRATION. DO NOT DELETE
Maps the Activity__c picklist values on the Task object to the "investigation_activity" XML node. This custom setting is referenced by the NI_WinaproachService Apex Class
CustomObject.label: Win@proach PI Activity Field Mapping
